# Secure Azure DevOps Security Role Assignment Fixture

This fixture demonstrates a least-privilege security role assignment for tests.

## Features

- Assigns a Reader role by default
- Uses explicit scope and resource inputs

## Key Configuration

Use this fixture when validating minimal permissions.

## Usage

```bash
terraform init
terraform plan
terraform apply
```

## Cleanup

```bash
terraform destroy
```
